speaker: Customer
text: You have reached the voicemail of Alex Johnson. Please leave a message after the beep.

speaker: Agent
text: Hello Alex, this is Sarah from Debt Solutions. I'm calling about your overdue balance.

speaker: Customer
text: At the tone, please record your message. When you are finished, you may hang up or press one for more options.

speaker: Agent
text: You can reach me at the number provided or visit our website for further assistance.

speaker: Customer
text: Thank you for your call. Goodbye.
